destiny.title: Destiny Analysis
destiny.subtitle: In-depth Zi Wei Dou Shu analysis to reveal your life's trajectory
destiny.formDesc: Please fill in the following information accurately for a professional destiny analysis report
destiny.name: Name
destiny.question: Your Questions
destiny.questionPlaceholder: e.g., Career, Wealth, Marriage, Health, etc.
destiny.submitSuccessDesc: Your request has been submitted. The report will be sent to your email within 48 hours
destiny.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
destiny.deliveryTime: * Professional masters will complete the analysis within 48 hours and send a detailed report via email
destiny.feature1Desc: Thousand-year-old destiny science essence, in-depth chart analysis
destiny.feature2Desc: Predict future trends and seize life opportunities
destiny.feature3Desc: Personally analyzed by senior masters from Mount Wutai for accuracy

prayer.title: Prayer Service
prayer.subtitle: Masters from Mount Wutai pray for you, convey wishes, and seek peace
prayer.lampDesc: Light a prayer lamp for you at Mount Wutai sacred site to illuminate the path and dispel darkness
prayer.lampFeature1: Lamp offering at Manjushri Bodhisattva Monastery
prayer.lampFeature2: Master chanting and dedication for merit completion
prayer.lampFeature3: Provide lamp offering photos and prayer certificate
prayer.incenseDesc: Offer incense for you at Mount Wutai sacred site to convey wishes and seek auspiciousness
prayer.incenseFeature2: Master praying and dedication on behalf
prayer.incenseFeature3: Provide incense offering photos and prayer certificate
prayer.formDesc: Please fill in the following information, we will pray sincerely for you
prayer.name: Name
prayer.namePlaceholder: Enter your name or the name of the prayer recipient
prayer.wishPlaceholder: Write your wish, e.g., Peace and Health, Career Success, Academic Progress, etc.
prayer.submitSuccessDesc: Your prayer request has been submitted, we will pray sincerely for you
prayer.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
prayer.deliveryTime: * We will complete the prayer within 3 business days and send the prayer certificate and photos via email
prayer.trust1Desc: One of the five major Buddhist sacred sites in the world, Manjushri Bodhisattva Monastery
prayer.trust2Desc: Each prayer is photographed to ensure authenticity and credibility
prayer.trust3Desc: After prayer completion, photos and certificates will be sent to your email
